attributes.description:
2018 Ford Kuga 1.5 Ecoboost Trend Auto
55 000 kms 
R 369 900.00

The six-speed auto doesn’t spend too much time hunting for gears and gives you quick-enough grunt when needed.
And has five-star safety rating ( not a 1.6L so no more fire jokes )
*1 603-litres of cargo spacewhile seats folded ( 4x 81cm Luggage bags) and a few sports bags
*132 kW of power and 240 N.m of torque
*Chrome Mags
*Semi-autonomous Active Park Assist with Perpendicular Parking
*Adaptive Cruise Control, 
*Blind Spot Information System (BLIS), 
*Lane Departure Warning and Lane Keeping Aid.

Test drives at your door, depending on your location.
All vehicles come with certificates from Dekra.
Trade-Ins are welcome.
Delivery to your door.

Finance Requirements:
1. Copy of ID
2. Copy of Driver’s License
3. Proof of Address
4. 3 Months Bank Statements & 3 Months Payslips

Price excluding License and Registration as well as Delivery Fee and is subject to your location.

Contact *Mac from Bidvest McCarthy Isuzu, we are based in Pretoria Silverlakes.

Phone & WhatsApp: 064 547 2149
